questions.question:
Answer the questions given below (refer Fig.2):


Fig. 2 Circuit diagram of three-phase bridge inverter


1. In a three-phase inverter operating in square wave mode, the output voltage waveform contains

answers.a: Both even and odd harmonics but no triplen harmonics

questions.question: 2. The load voltage frequency is equal to

answers.c: Difference of carrier and reference signal frequency (f<sub>c</sub>-f<sub>r</sub>)
answers.d: Sun of carrier and reference signal frequency (f<sub>c</sub>+f<sub>r</sub>)

questions.question: 3. The supply voltage is maintained constant in inverter by placing

answers.a: an inductor in series with the load
answers.b: capacitor in parallel to the load side
answers.c: capacitor in parallel to the supply side
answers.d: an inductor in parallel with the load

questions.question: 4. In a three-phase inverter, how many minimum number of switching devices are required?
5. The pulse width modulation control technique in inverters is used for
